website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a solid two-piece fry pan set, consider these All-Clad pans.
pros: This set includes 8- and 10-inch fry pans
Each pan features a durable tri-ply construction for consistent results and even heat distribution
cons: Some customers report that the nonstick coating tends to wear off over time

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pans but compared to my 25 year old AllClad they're not up to the same standard. The edges aren't finished as well, the metal isn't as heavy duty, the bottoms warp when they get hot. So you are paying mostly for the brand name but still they're better than the competition at the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: James W Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a wedding gift, and they were great for the first 6-8 months, but only a year after receiving them, the non stick is worse than our previous set of pans from Walmart. And we’re meticulous about never putting them in the dishwasher, and not using metal or abrasive utensils. So while they were great initially, I’m quite disappointed in their lack of longevity.
customer_reviews.author: jlseasgle215

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These pans have started to flake the non-stick coating within just months of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Rice

customer_reviews.title: excellent pans
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble with cheap pans warping in the center so that oil would run to the sides. I finally picked up some great quality pans and cooking has been much nicer! These are very heavy and beautiful. I'm also having fun learning to deglaze! If you're ready to invest in some great pans I recommend these, but make sure you familiarize yourself with how to care for them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non Stick Coating Started to Flake after One(!!) Week
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend the All Clad pan at all, despite they are great pans for cooking, the non stick coating starts to flake basically immediately after using them. The pan has only been used a few times and the coating has already dents and scratches. The pan has only been used with silicon utensils. At this price point this is outrages. I had $35 non stick pans which held up better than All Clad. Phone customer service of All Clad is closed. They are claiming this is due to Covid19. Excuse me but you are the only company I encountered which has not been able to adjust their operations within 5 months to this situation. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: dts

customer_reviews.title: Great Pans, horrible handles
customer_reviews.text: These are great pans, but the handles are horrible. They are shaped to be held underhanded, like throwing a softball. However, for most of our uses of the pan that is not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry Houser

customer_reviews.title: NON Stick Coating doesn't last long, then started COMING OFF in our FOOD.
customer_reviews.text: We love most All-Clad products and have used them for many years and so we bought these non-stick pans as they have a lifetime warranty. But 6 months into using them 2-3 times a week the non-stick coating was no longer effective and food started sticking to the pan... even when we use a lot of oil. We have never exposed these pans to extreme heat or put them in the oven (though the manufacturer says you can) and we always use silicone non-scratching utensils that you have to use with non-stick. But now the coating is COMING OFF the pan and into our food, this is terrible and doesn't seem safe or worth the expensive price tag.
customer_reviews.author: MIG

customer_reviews.title: Great pans, All Clad name and good price
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans - they worked really well making the ingredients for my lasagna. No sticking or scorching and we have an IC cooktop that they work well with also. They aren't as heavy as the copper clad version of which we also have a set, and yet they seem to be very sturdy. I'm truly happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Blemished surface
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today 8/5/20. There is some kind of blemish on the surface of the non-stick coating. I washed it to see if it was some kind of manufacturing residue. It did not wash off. I will contact the seller and see if they’re willing to replace. This isn’t a cheap non-stick pan, and I have many All-Clad pieces. I want to make sure I’m getting what I paid for. I will update this review if need be.
customer_reviews.author: DayumQuitPlayin

customer_reviews.title: My perfect egg pan
customer_reviews.text: All-Clad is a great, American made, heavy duty pan. A little more expensive, but worth it. My second set, but only because I mistreated the first.
customer_reviews.author: Y. kavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: lasted two years.  Was great for a while.
customer_reviews.text: frying eggs a couple times a week, this pan lasted just under two years. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: RedEdwards

customer_reviews.title: Best, professional pans
customer_reviews.text: Best, professional pans. I make perfect eggs and the best breakfasts! All Clad is very balanced and the handles are pretty cool but, for safety, I use my mits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I mean it is All-Clad. How can you go wrong! Just continuing the process of getting rid of the 30 year old Calphalon. Mostly use the all stainless copper lined but my wife loves these for easy cleanup and throw in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mitcham

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I struggle to keep a good temp without food sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Voyles

customer_reviews.title: I love All Clad!
customer_reviews.text: Great, easy to use, beautiful to display, easy clean up. Love these pans, use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these All-Clad Pans!
customer_reviews.text: Love the All-Clad quality! Very pleased. Great for scrambled eggs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really? I paid a lot of money for a quality product. I think I got a lemon. Big lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Two years of use and now in the garbage. Totally peeled!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sueets4thesueets

customer_reviews.title: All-Clad pans
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy. Heats up quite quickly, cooks evenly, and the non stick coating is really non stick. Not too wild about the shape of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rich G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came recommended by a chef, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just plain Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a gift. Recipient was and is very happy. If you are looking for beauty and top performance you can not do better than AllClad
customer_reviews.author: Phil Lange

customer_reviews.title: The defect in this pan could be harmful to the users health
customer_reviews.text: There is a defect in the 12 inch pan I would appreciate a replacement please
customer_reviews.author: mona jurich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as advertised. The new design of the angled sides allows a better fit for the All-Clad tops to fit. Excellent quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All-clad great for induction cooktops
customer_reviews.text: I have an induction rooftop. I had an all-clad pan, but then wanted another size. At a department store sale I found two induction capable pans and saved a lot of money, but the pans didn't heat evenly and I had to up the temperature. So I gave them to my daughter for her regular stovetop and immediately got on Amazon to order the Alll-clad.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: The pans work very well and are easy to clean as food just doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: The pans work very well and are easy to clean as food just doesn't stick! I think they were rather expensive, but are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RAKK

customer_reviews.title: Good Omelet Pans
customer_reviews.text: As is everything with All Clad these fry pans are terrific. We can finally make a decent omelet.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans!!! I use them literally every day! I thought I was getting the two sizes above what I ordered so check the size you want first.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pan and easy to cook in.
customer_reviews.author: Bronla w.

customer_reviews.title: Great pans. The only ones I will ever use ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. The only ones I will ever use again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C Truglio

customer_reviews.title: What you get is not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: I do not write many reviews, but the item description and pictures are misleading. Pictured are the French style skillets with more surface are on the base and sharper sloped sides. What you get are the fry pans with a smaller base and more gradual sloping of the sides and a horizontal lip versus the French skillet that has a vertical presentation. The devil is in the details and Amazon does not list this or state anything about it. So many products listed on here and it is not actually what you get.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Sears fish beautifully. Wanted a smaller pan so I could stop hauling around my 5qt sautee pan to sear one piece of tilapia. I love the higher and mid range All Clad products on general. Of course they are a pain to clean relative to non stick, but it is really good metal and they are durable to the wear of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick surface peeling - don’t bother buying!
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo sick about spending money on these pans when the nonstick surface is peeling off two years into using them. We are an All Clad family. But have had no luck with the nonstick pans. I would rather go to a box store and spend $15 on a pan that won’t peel. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn in DC

customer_reviews.title: Some good/some bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the pan, but the handle is uncomfortable compared to others. Very disappointing! I will not buy anymore All-Clad. Egg whites stick to the non stick surface, not severely but enough to have to scrub.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Posey

customer_reviews.title: I have other all-clad pans and I highly recommend the product
customer_reviews.text: All clad non-satick pan will evenly cook the food and the pans are strong. I have other all-clad pans and I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: rosesandbarbs

customer_reviews.title: Love, love All-Clad
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love every single thing I've ever bought from All-Clad. Will never buy a skillet from anyone else...they are TOTALLY worth the investment (but take care of them obviously...no dishwasher if you want them to last)
customer_reviews.author: Scollins

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the pans
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the pans. Have read cautions about not putting into the dishwasher. They wash up so easily that I will always hand wash. They are very sturdy so I look forward to not having them warp. Made in USA is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Great non stick pans
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. Great value. Lightweight and easy to handle. I do however, agree with a previous reviewer about the handles on all clad.....very uncomfortable in your hand. I own the heavier pans and the handles are very cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: PBandJ2015

customer_reviews.title: These pans are great quality. I guess you get what you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great quality. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kruger

customer_reviews.title: My go-to pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these skillets. I use one of them almost every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The factory packaging scratches the 10" pan
customer_reviews.text: These are packed such that they are nested with cardboard between them. However, on removing them from the package I noticed what looks like scuffing from the cardboard on the 10" nonstick surface! I immediately requested a replacement but it too had the same issue. This is a terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant T.

customer_reviews.title: and these pans are the best. One tip- get the pan nice and hot ...
customer_reviews.text: So after a few months cooking everything from scrambled eggs to miso-ginger eggplant stir-fry and mushroom gravy, these pans are a revelation. I have tried many other brands in the past including calphalon and le creust, and these pans are the best.One tip- get the pan nice and hot before adding food, to help it stay non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These pans do everything and clean up like a breeze. Simply great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pans so Get Cooking !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Alclad makes great products and these pans are terrific !!!!. There is no need for cooking spay or oil & butter. You get pans that cook fast and cook food a lot healthier. I already owned an Alclad 12 " Saute Pan (Stainless Steel, no coating ) and I love it as well. These pans will have you cooking like a professional.
customer_reviews.author: stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nonstick eggs. Horrendous handles
customer_reviews.text: Updated 2/17: A follow-up...I cooked a large 5-egg omelette today that required flipping the eggs over in the 10" pan. Almost couldn't do it. It is so very uncomfortable to handle these pans. I would suggest All-clad take a cue from OXO on designing comfortable-to-use kitchen items. Perfectly cooked nonstick eggs. However, whoever designed and subsequently approved the handles should be fired. They are some of the most uncomfortable handles on any pots and pans I've ever used. I purchased two of the smaller sauce pans so handling them should be no problem. However, if they have this handle design on larger pans picking them up maybe difficult and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these non stick pans!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than capalon nonstick pans! I love them! Eggs slide off with no problem. The stainless back cleans beautifully. Very attractive and extremely functional!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pans. Sizes are good for cooking alone and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pans. Sizes are good for cooking alone and for others. Somewhat pricey but is nice quality. Very quick service.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo del Lago

product_meta.title: All-Clad 410810 NSR2 Stainless Steel Dishwasher Safe Oven Safe PFOA-free Nonstick 8-Inch and 10-Inch Fry Pan Set, 2-Piece, Silver
product_meta.description: Style:D3 NonstickSear, brown, and pan fry everything from eggs to meat with the All-Clad Stainless Steel Nonstick Fry Pan Set. This pan's flat bottom and flared sides make it easy to toss food or turn it with a nonstick spatula. Its three-ply bonded stainless steel construction and aluminum core deliver exceptional heating performance, and the fry pan is compatible with induction stoves. The PFOA-free nonstick coating is durable and provides excellent release.
feature_bullets: Hand-washing recommended; Easy to clean non-stick coating
Exterior compatible on all induction as well as traditional cooktops
Essential cookware item for the novice or well-seasoned cook
Perfect bridal or housewarming gift; Lifetime warranty
NOTE: Refer user manual before use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
